localize.text: It’s time to complete the final piece of the puzzle you have been missing.
May you have the best of luck on the last leg of your journey.
Saying something like I hope you will finally be happy, or that some of the leftover pain can be relieved now, have long become empty words.
There are several more things I would like to say, but let me sum them up into one sentence.
I wish you success this time.
I enjoyed being with you for not only these forty-five days, but also the moments you don’t remember.
Well, there is just one last Sephirah you need to meet.
He holds in his hands a warmth that looks so comforting, but he can shatter people’s hearts like they’re nothing.
